lead_paragraph: A man was stabbed and beaten to death in Park Slope, Brooklyn, early Sunday morning, according to the police and relatives of the man.
snippet: The 22-year-old man was hit in the head with a crowbar and stabbed three times during a scuffle with a group of men Sunday morning in Park Slope, Brooklyn.

headline.main: Man Fatally Stabbed During Fight in Brooklyn

abstract: The 22-year-old man was hit in the head with a crowbar and stabbed three times during a scuffle with a group of men Sunday morning in Park Slope, Brooklyn.
